items.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
items.description: Vincent Chan admitted 26 sexual offences relating to children aged between two and four in what the Met Police called one of their most "harrowing and...

items.title: What latest Ukraine talks reveal about Putin's state of mind
items.description: Russia's president looks determined to continue his war in Ukraine - even as the country's economic problems grow.

items.title: Children hurt as school bus roof ripped off by bridge
items.description: Among the injured is a boy, 8, who has been taken to hospital with a "non-serious" head injury.

items.title: King Charles welcomes German president on first state visit in 27 years
items.description: Germany's president will receive a ceremonial welcome from the King and a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

items.title: Salford Red Devils wound up by High Court over debts
items.description: Troubled former Super League club Salford Red Devils are wound up by the High Court.
